name: The Preamble To The Constitution Quiz | World | 10 Questions

questions.text: We the ________ of the United States,
In order to form a more perfect ________,
questions.explanation:
union.

	Oh yes a country in harmony.

justice.

	To make everything fair for all. To establish a court system to make every man equal under the law.

defense & defence.

	So we can fight if we have to. All states come as one and defend this nation.

welfare.

	Make sure most are pretty happy and healthy. A better standard of living.

blessings & blessing.

	All that we should be thankful for.

questions.text: Of liberty to ourselves and our ________
questions.explanation:
posterity.

	Freedom for us and the future generations.

establish.

	To make, or in this case write.

questions.text: This ________ for the United States of America.
questions.explanation:
Constitution.

	Our fundamental laws and the framework for the way we will live.
